member.name: T:Primavera.Hydrogen.AspNetCore.Webhooks.BackgroundServices.RetryPolicy
member.summary: Provides the retry policy used for publishing webhooks events to the subscribers callbacks.
member.remarks: The policy determines the moment when a callback should be retried again and uses an exponential wait period starting at 10 seconds on the first retry.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.AspNetCore.Webhooks.BackgroundServices.RetryPolicy.NextRetry(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.DateTimeOffset)
member.summary: Calculates the next retry.
member.returns: The moment when the next retry should be performed. Null if it should not be retried.

member.name: T:Primavera.Hydrogen.AspNetCore.Webhooks.WebhooksOptions
member.summary: Defines the configuration options used by webhooks services.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.AspNetCore.Webhooks.WebhooksOptions.DefaultCallbackTimeout
member.summary: The default value for (in seconds).

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.AspNetCore.Webhooks.WebhooksOptions.DefaultCallbackMaxRetries
member.summary: The default value for .

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.AspNetCore.Webhooks.WebhooksOptions.DefaultCallbackRetryMinBackoff
member.summary: The default value for (in seconds).

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.AspNetCore.Webhooks.WebhooksOptions.DefaultCallbackRetryMaxBackoff
member.summary: The default value for (in seconds).

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.AspNetCore.Webhooks.WebhooksOptions.ApplicationName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the application that provides the webhooks. This option is required.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.AspNetCore.Webhooks.WebhooksOptions.EventsSupported
member.summary: Gets or sets the webhooks events supported by the application. This option is required.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.AspNetCore.Webhooks.WebhooksOptions.CallbackTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the timeout when invoking webhooks callback actions. This option is required. The default value is .

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.AspNetCore.Webhooks.WebhooksOptions.CallbackMaxRetries
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of times the callback action for a particular webhook event will be retried before giving up. When a webhook event exhausts all retries, the associated subscription will be disabled. This option is required. The default value is .

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.AspNetCore.Webhooks.WebhooksOptions.CallbackRetryMinBackoff
member.summary: Gets or sets the minimum time to wait before retrying callback actions. This option is required. The default value is .

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.AspNetCore.Webhooks.WebhooksOptions.CallbackRetryMaxBackoff
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum time to wait before retrying callback actions. This option is required. The default value is .

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.AspNetCore.Webhooks.WebhooksOptions.Events
member.summary: Gets or sets the instance of the events triggered by the services.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.AspNetCore.Webhooks.WebhooksOptions.SerializerOptions
member.summary: Gets or sets the serializer options.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.AspNetCore.Webhooks.WebhooksOptions.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.AspNetCore.Webhooks.WebhooksOptions.Validate
member.summary: Validates the configuration options.

member.name: T:Primavera.Hydrogen.AspNetCore.Webhooks.Validation.ValidationRegularExpressions
member.summary: Provides regular expressions used in validations.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.AspNetCore.Webhooks.Validation.ValidationRegularExpressions.ApplicationNameRegularExpression
member.summary: The application name regular expression.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.AspNetCore.Webhooks.Validation.ValidationRegularExpressions.ClientIdRegularExpression
member.summary: The client identifier regular expression.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.AspNetCore.Webhooks.Validation.ValidationRegularExpressions.SubscriptionIdRegularExpression
member.summary: The subscription identifier regular expression.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.AspNetCore.Webhooks.Validation.ValidationRegularExpressions.EventNameRegularExpression
member.summary: The event name regular expression.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.AspNetCore.Webhooks.Validation.ValidationRegularExpressions.ApplicationName
member.remarks:
Pattern explanation:
Match if at the beginning of the string.
1st capture group.
Match a character in the set [A-Z].
Loop greedily any number of times.
2nd capture group.
Match a character in the set [A-Z\d].
Match if at the end of the string or if before an ending newline.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.AspNetCore.Webhooks.Validation.ValidationRegularExpressions.ClientId
member.remarks:
Pattern explanation:
Match if at the beginning of the string.
Loop greedily any number of times.
1st capture group.
Match a character in the set [-A-Za-z\d].
Match if at the end of the string or if before an ending newline.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.AspNetCore.Webhooks.Validation.ValidationRegularExpressions.SubscriptionId
member.remarks:
Pattern explanation:
Match if at the beginning of the string.
Loop greedily any number of times.
1st capture group.
Match a character in the set [-A-Za-z\d].
Match if at the end of the string or if before an ending newline.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.AspNetCore.Webhooks.Validation.ValidationRegularExpressions.EventName
member.remarks:
Pattern explanation:
Match if at the beginning of the string.
1st capture group.
Match a character in the set [A-Z].
Loop greedily any number of times.
2nd capture group.
Match a character in the set [A-Za-z].
3rd capture group.
Match '_'.
4th capture group.
Match a character in the set [A-Z].
Loop greedily any number of times.
5th capture group.
Match a character in the set [a-z].
Match if at the end of the string or if before an ending newline.
